title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. It seems like the actions available on text selection are distributed on a personal taste basis. This is not clear to users as to why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view just to access certain actions. We need to make all actions reachable from the editor.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu for text selection.
